Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar.  beat in egg.  In a small bowl, combine bananas and milk.  Combine the flour, baking powder and baking soda; add to creamed mixture alternately with banana mixture.  Fold in chocolate chips and pecans.

Pour into a greased 9-in. x 5-in. x 3-in. loaf pan.  Bake at 350 degrees F for 60-70 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.  Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.
